Name: Centro Natura
Description: Vegan and vegetarian bistro in a wellness area, serving dishes prepared with organic products from the market.

Name: Waikiki Poké
Description: Why not try Poke at home today? With Waikiki Poké in Bologna you have the best dishes right at your home.

Name: Nectare
Description: In the center of Bologna, a small and cozy place with vegan and vegetarian dishes, plant based burgers and freshly prepared extracts.

Name: Conad
Description: At Conad you can do a complete shopping experience, thanks to our members and employees: gastronomy, typical Italian products, organic, gluten-free and lactose-free, for early childhood.

Name: Just Eat
Description: Order food from restaurants and pizzerias near you. Choose your favorite menu and take advantage of new discounts and offers every day.

Name: Pizza Altero
Description: Legendary pizzeria for Bologna, the first to sell freshly baked pizza. High quality that has been maintained over the years.

Name: Tamburini
Description: Wine bar and gastronomy in business since 1932 offering sausages, cold cuts and first courses to be enjoyed inside and on a terrace.

Name: Yoma
Description: Bright and charming place with Japanese, Thai and Asian fusion dishes, as well as all you can eat.

Name: Pizzeria Due Torri
Description: Cozy place offering classic cut or round pizzas, as well as calzones and sandwiches.

Name: Ragù
Description: Take away Bolognese cuisine. From tagliatelle to tortellini, from meat sauce to all the Bolognese tradition.

Name: Kinkhao Thai Food
Description: The dishes of the Thai Cuisine in Street Food Gourmet version. Enjoy them with us, take them away or order them and we will take them directly to your house.

Name: Gusto Chengdu
Description: You will be surprise by the superb taste of the Chinese cuisine, the delicious scent and all the spicy of the most traditional dishes of the city of Chengdu.

Name: Pamcial
Description: Historical Middle Eastern gastronomy of Bologna, the choice of the menu is wide and absolutely valid for quality, quantity and price!

Name: Beirut Snak
Description: Lebanese gastronomy is a rich blend of different ingredients from different Lebanese regions. Come and try our cuisine and our hospitality.
